results.name: A period 6 sequence.
comment: Terms of the simple continued fraction of 133/[sqrt(18530)-29]. Decimal expansion of 121/819. - _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 05 2009
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,1).
